On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Katie

 Prince & Mercer

⏲ 2:30 p.m. on Wednesday, January 22

What are you doing today?

I’m just coming from the Agenda trade show. I wish that my day was ending now, but I’m heading back to my office.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Walking out of the office at the end of the day. Then I get to go off and do whatever I want.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Very similar to today. The trade show is in town and it’s two days, so I’ll be back there.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
